#text=I waited at the bus stop for my bus to come pick me up .
#text=It seemed to be running a little behind today .
#text=There were other people at the stop as well , so I waited in lined for my turn to get on .
#text=I climbed the three steps up into the bus , and then deposited my change to pay for the trip .
#text=The fare was $ 1.50 so I put six quarters into the box .
#text=Then I walked down the aisle of the bus and looked for an empty seat .
#text=I found one next to a young person listening to music on their headphones .
#text=The bus pulled away from the curb .
#text=As we rode , I looked out the window and watched the stores and houses pass by .
#text=After about 10 minutes , we reached my stop .
#text=I waited for the bus to come to a complete stop and then exited , steeping down and then stepping back up the curb onto the sidewalk .
